metadata.name: Mister Roger's Neighborhood
metadata.summary: Helping children learn about themselves, about others and about their world.
metadata.description: Mister Roger offers children a place where they feel accepted and understood. The show helps children to develop social and emotional skills necessary in a community through conversation, songs, visits with neighbors and guests, and puppet stories.
metadata.keywords: PBS, PBS KIDS, kids, children, children's programming, cartoons, educational, reading
